更新(2024/8/30)
- 减少文件 I/O 操作，优化初始化方法，提升首次加载速度。
  - 移除每个补全目录下的 alias.txt 文件，使用 data.json 文件存储数据。
- 将配置数据文件 config.json 合并到 data.json 中。
  - 注意: 如果使用了 scoop 去安装 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>，请检查应用清单(manifest)中的 persist 是否更新为 data.json。
- 修改了几乎所有配置项的名称。
  - 配置项名称的修改，不影响正常使用，在更新版本后，也会自动迁移旧的配置项到新的配置项。
  - 比如:
    - <@Magenta>update<@Blue> => <@Magenta>enable_completions_update<@Blue>
    - <@Magenta>module_update<@Blue> => <@Magenta>enable_module_update<@Blue>
    - <@Magenta>menu_show_tip<@Blue> => <@Magenta>enable_tip<@Blue>
    - ...
- 移除了两个配置项: <@Magenta>github<@Blue> 和 <@Magenta>gitee<@Blue>。
  - 如果需要自定义地址，请使用 <@Magenta>url<@Blue> 配置项。
  - <@Magenta>psc config url <url><@Blue>
- 其他的优化和修复。
en-US:
Update(2024/8/30)
- Reduce file I/O operations and optimize initialization method to improve first load speed.
  - Remove the alias.txt file in each completion directory, and use data.json to store data.
- Merge configuration data file config.json into data.json.
  - Note: If you use scoop to install <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>, please check the manifest (persist) to update to data.json.
- Modify the name of almost all configuration items.
  - The name of the configuration item has been modified, and it will not affect normal use. When the version is updated, it will automatically migrate the old configuration item to the new configuration item.
  - For example:
    - <@Magenta>update<@Blue> => <@Magenta>enable_completions_update<@Blue>
    - <@Magenta>module_update<@Blue> => <@Magenta>enable_module_update<@Blue>
    - <@Magenta>menu_show_tip<@Blue> => <@Magenta>enable_tip<@Blue>
    - ...
- Remove two configuration items: <@Magenta>github<@Blue> and <@Magenta>gitee<@Blue>.
  - If you need to customize the url, please use the <@Magenta>url<@Blue> configuration item.
  - <@Magenta>psc config url <url><@Blue>
- Other optimizations and fixes.

修复(2024/8/12)
- <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> 模块会占用两个全局命名，<@Magenta>$PSCompletions<@Blue>(变量) 和 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>(函数)
  - 现在，它们都为只读，强行覆盖会报错，防止误操作导致模块失效
  - 不过 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>(函数) 可以通过配置修改函数名
- 添加一个配置项 <@Magenta>function_name<@Blue>, 默认值为 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>
  - 设置: <@Magenta>psc config function_name <name><@Blue>
  - 使用场景:
    - 当你需要定义一个函数，名字刚好也必须为 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> 时
    - 你可以通过 <@Magenta>function_name<@Blue> 将本模块的函数修改为一个不冲突的名字
  - 需要注意:
    - <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>(函数)可以通过配置修改，但 <@Magenta>$PSCompletions<@Blue>(变量)是无法修改的
    - 当你需要定义一个变量，名字刚好也必须为 <@Magenta>$PSCompletions<@Blue>
    - 无法解决，要么你不使用 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> 模块，要么给你要定义的变量改个名字
- 对 <@Magenta>PowerShell<@Blue> 命令的 ToolTip 提示信息简单处理，优化显示
- 当菜单显示后，输入字符进行过滤不再更改菜单的宽度
- 修复了可以将一个已存在的命令设置为别名的bug
- 优化逻辑运算，移除一些多余的运算
en-US:
Fix(2024/8/12)
- <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> module will take up two global names, <@Magenta>$PSCompletions<@Blue> (variable) and <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> (function).
  - Now, they are both read-only, and trying to overwrite will have an error, preventing accidental operation from causing the module to fail.
  - However, <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> (function) can be configured to change the function name.
- Add a configuration item <@Magenta>function_name<@Blue>, with a default value of <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>.
  - Setting: <@Magenta>psc config function_name <name><@Blue>
  - Use in the following case:
    - When you need to define a function, the name must be <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue>.
    - You can use <@Magenta>function_name<@Blue> to rename the function of this module to a non-conflicting name.
  - Note:
    - <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> (function) can be configured, but <@Magenta>$PSCompletions<@Blue> (variable) cannot be modified.
    - When you need to define a variable, the name must be <@Magenta>$PSCompletions<@Blue>.
    - It cannot be solved, either you don't use <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> module, or you give the variable you define a different name.
- Simple processing of ToolTip information for <@Magenta>PowerShell<@Blue> commands, optimized display.
- When the menu is displayed, filtering by input characters no longer changes the width of the menu.
- Fix a bug where you could set an existing command as an alias.
- Optimize logical operations, remove some unnecessary operations.

更新(2024/8/9)
  - 添加了三个 <@Magenta>menu<@Blue> 配置
    1. <@Magenta>menu_trigger_key<@Blue>: 默认值为 <@Magenta>Tab<@Blue>, 用于设置补全菜单的触发按键
       - 设置: <@Magenta>psc menu config menu_trigger_key <key><@Blue>
    2. <@Magenta>menu_enhance<@Blue>: 默认值为 <@Magenta>1<@Blue>, 用于设置是否启用补全菜单增强功能
       - 禁用它: <@Magenta>psc menu config menu_enhance 0<@Blue>
       - 开启后，<@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> 会拦截所有补全，并使用 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> 提供的补全菜单渲染补全
       - 比如，<@Magenta>PowerShell<@Blue> 中的 <@Magenta>Get-*<@Blue>,<@Magenta>Set-*<@Blue> 等命令都会使用 <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> 提供的补全菜单渲染补全
       - 需要注意，此配置项生效的前提是启用了 <@Magenta>menu_enable<@Blue>
       - 关于菜单增强:
       - Github: https://github.com/abgox/PSCompletions/blob/main/README-CN.md#关于菜单增强
       - Gitee:  https://gitee.com/abgox/PSCompletions/blob/main/README-CN.md#关于菜单增强
    3. <@Magenta>menu_show_tip_when_enhance<@Blue>: 默认值为 <@Magenta>1<@Blue>, 设置不是通过 <@Magenta>psc add<@Blue> 添加的补全，是否显示命令提示信息
       - 禁用它: <@Magenta>psc menu config menu_show_tip_when_enhance 0<@Blue>
       - 和 <@Magenta>menu_enhance<@Blue> 一起使用
  - 解决了多字节文字可能导致菜单出现部分渲染错误的问题
    - 这配合 <@Magenta>menu_enhance<@Blue> 很有用
    - 比如，输入 <@Magenta>cd<@Blue> 命令按下 <@Magenta>Tab<@Blue> 触发补全，即使路径补全中有中文等多字节文字，菜单也不会有渲染问题
  - 补全提示信息支持根据可用宽度自动换行
    - 为了体验更好，<@Magenta>menu_tip_follow_cursor<@Blue> 配置项的默认值从 <@Magenta>0<@Blue> 修改为 <@Magenta>1<@Blue>
  - 重构代码，调整源代码文件目录结构，提取公共代码
  - 使用多线程优化性能，移除一些多余的执行语句
  - 修复一些其他问题
  - 整理代码
en-US:
Update(2024/8/9)
  - Add three <@Magenta>menu<@Blue> configurations:
    1. <@Magenta>menu_trigger_key<@Blue>: Default value is <@Magenta>Tab<@Blue>, which is used to set the trigger key of the completion menu.
       - Setting: <@Magenta>psc menu config menu_trigger_key <key><@Blue>
    2. <@Magenta>menu_enhance<@Blue>: Default value is <@Magenta>1<@Blue>, which is used to to enable or disable the enhanced completion menu feature.
       - Disable it: <@Magenta>psc menu config menu_enhance 0<@Blue>
       - When enabled, <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> will intercept all completions and uses the completion menu provided by <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> to render completions.
       - For example, commands such as <@Magenta>Get-*<@Blue>, <@Magenta>Set-*<@Blue> in <@Magenta>PowerShell<@Blue> will use the completion menu provided by <@Magenta>PSCompletions<@Blue> to render the completion.
       - Note: This setting only takes effect if <@Magenta>menu_enable<@Blue> is also enabled.
       - About menu enhance:
       - Github: https://github.com/abgox/PSCompletions/blob/main/README.md#about-menu-enhance
       - Gitee:  https://gitee.com/abgox/PSCompletions/blob/main/README.md#about-menu-enhance
    3. <@Magenta>menu_show_tip_when_enhance<@Blue>: Default value is <@Magenta>1<@Blue>, which is used to control whether to show command tips for completions that are not added through <@Magenta>psc add<@Blue>.
       - Disable it: <@Magenta>psc menu config menu_show_tip_when_enhance 0<@Blue>
       - Used together with <@Magenta>menu_enhance<@Blue>.
  - Fix an issue where multi-byte characters(such as Chinese characters) could cause partial rendering errors in the menu.
    - This is useful with <@Magenta>menu_enhance<@Blue>.
    - For example, when using the <@Magenta>cd<@Blue> command, even if the path completion contains Chinese or other multi-byte characters, the menu will render correctly.
  - Completion tips now support automatic line wrapping based on available width.
    - For a better experience, the default value of the <@Magenta>menu_tip_follow_cursor<@Blue> config has been changed from <@Magenta>0<@Blue> to <@Magenta>1<@Blue>.
  - Refactor code by reorganizing the source file directory structure and extracting common code.
  - Use multi-threading to optimize performance and remove some redundant code.
  - Fix some other issues.
  - Clean up the code.

    - You must import the PSCompletions module first, and then modify the terminal output encoding. Otherwise, it will still display incorrectly.

zh-CN:
更新(2024/5/15)
<@Yellow>
  如果你当前使用的 PSCompletions 模块需要管理员权限，你应该删除 PSCompletions 模块，然后以用户权限安装最新版的模块。
  完整的模块安装命令: <@Magenta>Install-Module PSCompletions -Scope CurrentUser<@Blue>

  - 4.0.0 版本重构了整个模块，解决了许多不合理的地方，所以完全不兼容旧版本的配置和补全
    1. 性能优化:
       - 提升了模块加载速度
       - 提升了补全响应速度
    2. 补全菜单:
       - 补全菜单完全重写，菜单渲染的稳定性大幅提高，从根本上解决了许多渲染 bug
       - 补全菜单新增了许多的配置项，你可以自行通过触发补全以及提示信息查看
       - 比如: <@Magenta>menu_show_tip<@Blue>, 它可以控制补全提示信息是否显示，如果你对命令足够熟悉，建议禁用补全提示信息
       - 此配置也可以单独给某一个补全设置，参考 <@Magenta>psc completion<@Blue> 下的命令
    3. 补全别名:
       - 现在补全别名支持多个，你可以随意添加。理论上，你可以添加无数个别名
       - 比如，你可以添加 .\scoop.ps1 这样的别名，这在有些时候比较有用
    4. 补全文件和模块解耦
       - 现在可以只编写 json 文件去新增/更新/翻译一个补全，不需要涉及到代码
       - 同时使用了 json schema 控制 json 文件的类型，这让想要为仓库添加补全的贡献者创建 PR 的难度大幅降低
       - 比如你觉得某一个命令的描述不够完善，你也可以修改它的 json 文件后之后，提交一个 PR
    5. 语言:
       - 现在从模块层面，支持任何语言，模块会根据语言配置以及每一个补全的 config.json 文件来决定语言
       - 这意味着以后可以添加更多语言的支持，只需要编写对应的 json 文件即可
    6. 其他: 
       - 新增了一些按键映射，你现在可以通过许多种按键方式在补全菜单中选择补全项，你可以选择一种适合自己的。
           - 选择上一个补全/选择下一个补全
           - Up/Down
           - Left/Right
           - Shift + Tab/Tab
           - Shift + Space/Space
           - Ctrl + u/Ctrl + d
           - Ctrl + p/Ctrl + n
       - 现在符号被放在了补全项的后面，补全提示信息中不再出现符号
       - ...
en-US:
Update(2024/5/15)
<@Yellow>
  If you are using the PSCompletions module with administrator permission, you should remove the PSCompletions module and install the latest version with user permission.
  Full module installation command: <@Magenta>Install-Module PSCompletions -Scope CurrentUser<@Blue>

  - This version completely rewrites the module, and solves many inappropriate places, so it's completely incompatible with the old version configuration and completion.
    1. Performance optimization:
       - Improve module loading speed.
       - Improve completion response speed.
    2. Completion menu:
       - Completely rewrite the completion menu, which greatly improves the stability of the menu rendering, and solves many rendering bugs from the root.
       - The completion menu now has many configuration items, you can trigger completion by running <@Magenta>psc menu<@Blue>, then learn about them by completion tip.
       - For example: <@Magenta>menu_show_tip<@Blue>, which can control whether the completion tip is displayed.
           - If you are familiar with the command, it's recommended to disable the completion tip.
           - This configuration can also be set separately for each completion, refer to <@Magenta>psc completion<@Blue> for command.
    3. Completion alias:
       - Now completion alias supports multiple, you can add as many as you like. Theoretically, you can add an infinite number of aliases.
       - For example, you can add .\scoop.ps1  as an alias, which can be useful in some cases.
    4. Decoupling of completion file and module.
       - Add/update/translate completions now doesn't involve module core code.
       - Use json schema to control the type of json file, which makes it easier for contributors to create PR for the completion repository.
       - For example, if you think the description of a command is not good, you can modify its json file and create a PR.
    5. Language:
       - Now the module supports any language, and the module determines the language based on the language configuration and each completion's config.json file.
       - It means that more languages can be supported in the future by simply writing the corresponding json file.
    6. Other: 
       - Added some key mappings, which allows you to select completion items in the completion menu using various key combinations. You can choose one that suits you.
           - Select previous/next item
           - Up/Down
           - Left/Right
           - Tab/Shift + Tab
           - Space/Shift + Space
           - Ctrl + u/Ctrl + d
           - Ctrl + p/Ctrl + n
       - The symbol is now placed behind the completion item, and the symbol is no longer displayed in the completion tip.
       - ...
